org.openadaptor.spring.processor.factory
Class ConditionProcessorFactoryBean

java.lang.Object
  org.openadaptor.core.Component
      org.openadaptor.spring.processor.factory.ConditionProcessorFactoryBean
All Implemented Interfaces:
Administrable, org.springframework.beans.factory.FactoryBean, IComponent
public class ConditionProcessorFactoryBean
extends Component
implements org.springframework.beans.factory.FactoryBean

Spring FactoryBean designed to simplify configuring a CondtionProcessor to conditionally set a named attribute. The Factory bean uses expression strings to configure the if/then/else processors. An ISimpleRecordAccessor can be configured which will apply to all expressions.
